messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Arrogance and Humility
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/4/03 11:34:31 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... If there s someone who outranks you but for whom for some reason you have negative opinions
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/4/03 11:34:31 PM Eastern Standard Time,
SandraDodd@... writes:

> http://SandraDodd.com/humility/formality7.html
>
>
If there's someone who outranks you but for whom for some reason you have
negative opinions and small regard, take a moment to think what they can do
that you can't do. There is your honest humility.
It will change you.

Wonderful Sandra!
*~*Elissa Jill*~*
unschooling Momma to 3 beautiful brilliant people
Loving partner for life to Joey
terrible guitarist, fair singer and happy woman.






[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
